text: Tupolev Tu-154 (Russian: Tyполев Ту-154; NATO reporting name: Careless) is a Soviet long-range, narrow-body jet airliner, seating capacity for 152—180 passengers, produced by Tupolev. It was designed by Aleksandr S. Shengardt. Category:Civil aircraft Category:Soviet & Russian aircraft
title: Tupolev Tu-154
